summary: 1993  was a common year starting on Friday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Cameron Bright  is a Canadian actor. He has appeared in the films Godsend, Birth, Running Scared, Ultraviolet, X-Men: The Last Stand, Thank You for Smoking and four installments of The Twilight Saga.
^ Ouzounian, Richard . "Bright future". Toronto Star. p. D01.
title: Cameron Bright
